document_data.mainbody: '''Trade domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with trade-related [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: Once per day, they could use ''[[detect thoughts]]'' innately for some minutes.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[message]]'', ''[[gembomb]]'', and ''[[eagle's splendor]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[sending]]'', ''[[fabricate]]'', and ''[[true seeing]]''. Those that were masters in this domain had access to ''[[Mordenkainen's magnificent mansion]]'', ''[[mind blank]]'', and ''[[discern location]]''.
